title: Homes On The Grange: The Storied Tents Of A Pa. Fair
teaser: The Grange Fair of central Pennsylvania harkens back to the days of the region's rural farming in the 19th century. Beyond the trappings of the typical fair, WPSU's Emily Reddy reports that families bring nearly a thousand tents to live in during the fair â€” many of which have been passed down through the generations.
